ai-tika-abh02t29:61_2: That’s how the eighteen bases are spoken of:
ai-tika-abh02t29:61_5: The fourth tetrad and poisonous contemplation is said to be the construction of the opposite sex.
ai-tika-abh02t29:62_0: This is the discussion on limited objects.
ai-tika-abh02t29:62_1: In the lower room, at the upper edge of the noble ones is said to be aroused with mind.
ai-tika-abh02t29:63_0: “Where do they respond to these twelve?”
ai-tika-abh02t29:63_1: he speaks with this supermundane fruit in the highest fruit.
ai-tika-abh02t29:63_2: It is here in the phrase of all the particular component that it should be understood here in the case of the breaths of all the way already stated . This should be understood as “where.”
ai-tika-abh02t29:63_4: What is called “blessing” is to be prepared in the fourfold reckoning of the meaning beginning with the syllables beginning with the firstly and so on.
ai-tika-abh02t29:63_5: nine hundred and ninety-six objects have objected,
ai-tika-abh02t29:65_0: “‘The singing of form’ is there, this is sound, this is like the sound of coughing, this is like the sound of a divine eye. It is nearby, without making a sound, with clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, he goes to see the divine eye.
ai-tika-abh02t29:65_1: but, when a cart is drawn into it, he thinks, “For he is working over a league,” and when a league was carried away he said, “Through this was said and with his hands,” he said, “Through the auspicious works”.
ai-tika-abh02t29:66_0: The Questions of questions is finished.
ai-tika-abh02t29:67_0: The explanation of the absorption is finished.
